verses.name: Job 41:1
verses.text: Canst thou draw out leviathan with an hook? or his tongue with a cord which thou lettest down?

verses.name: Job 41:2
verses.text: Canst thou put an hook into his nose? or bore his jaw through with a thorn?

verses.name: Job 41:3
verses.text: Will he make many supplications unto thee? will he speak soft words unto thee?

verses.name: Job 41:4
verses.text: Will he make a covenant with thee? wilt thou take him for a servant for ever?

verses.name: Job 41:5
verses.text: Wilt thou play with him as with a bird? or wilt thou bind him for thy maidens?

verses.name: Job 41:6
verses.text: Shall the companions make a banquet of him? shall they part him among the merchants?
